song.title: To the Ends of the Earth
song.lyrics:
[V] .Em C2 G D Em C G D Love unfailing, overtaking my heart, You take me in .Em C2 G D C2 Finding peace again, fear is lost, in all You are
[P] .D Em And I would give the world to tell Your story . C2 Cause I know that You've called me . G I know that You've called me || .D C2 I've lost myself for good within Your promise . Em And I won't hide it . C2 I won't hide it
[C] .G D Jesus I believe in You, and I would go . Am7 To the ends of the earth . C2 To the ends of the earth || . G For You alone are the Son of God .F2 All the world will see . Am7 That You are God . C2 That You are God
song.presentation: V P C V P C P C
